text:
(a)  
Sec 13(b)(15)
provides an OT exemption for "any employee engaged in the processing of
maple sap into sugar (other than refined sugar) or syrup". (b)  The principles in IB 780.815 thru
780.819 are applicable for purposes of Sec 13(b)(15). However, the exemption is
presently limited to maple sap processing.
html:
(a)   Sec 13(b)(15) provides an OT exemption for "any employee engaged in the processing of maple sap into sugar (other than refined sugar) or syrup".

 

(b)  The principles in IB 780.815 thru 780.819 are applicable for purposes of Sec 13(b)(15). However, the exemption is presently limited to maple sap processing.
